.. _createServiceCard:

Creating a Service Card
===============================

The purpose of this page is to guide you on all the steps required to deploy a new service through CitizenOne.

To accomplish this, you will need the following:

1. :ref:`Create a Policy<creating_policies>` (if applicable)
2. :ref:`Create an Organization<creating_organizations>` (if applicable)
3. :ref:`Create an Application<creating_applications>` (if applicable)
4. :ref:`Create a Service Card<creating_service_cards>`
5. :ref:`Create a Rule<creating_rules>` (if applicable)
6. :ref:`Create a Trust Provider<creating_providers>` (if applicable)

Please refer to the pages above to setup your service card.
